summary: Encapsulates Azure Pipelines as a CI provider, offering functionality to detect repository changes, retrieve Git metadata, generate resource prefixes, and manage authentication for core CI services, with standard getters for base commit and Git details and support checks.
business_intent: Facilitates integration with Azure Pipelines to automate CI/CD workflows, enabling applications to detect code changes, configure resource identifiers, and handle authentication within Azure DevOps pipelines.
